name: Nectar of the Gods (itch)
description:
Nectar of the Gods is an IN DEVELOPMENT 2D real-time strategy game about bugs addicted to human beverages. Align with a bug family, strategically deploy your units, and make sure there's not a drop of sugar left!

Check out the gamedev blog here: http://bitly.com/bwt-gamedev-blog

Controls:

Controller (Recommended)

Left Analog / Dpad to move, L/R Trigger to open bug wheels, select bug and release

Keyboard

WASD to move, J/K keys to open bug wheels, select bug and release

Music Credits: Yin_Yang_Jake007, Department64, PaynesBeats, Jadfish, kmyers1316 from freesound.org
